posts.post_content: Just back today from SGC.  I won't say it's undergraded but does present better than the technical grade of 1.5.  Has a tiny speck of paper loss on the left border.  Has a fairly long but light crease that starts just above the paper loss and runs down thru his buttons.  Also has what looks light accidental ink on the bottom left and bottom back.  $8,900 with no fees. [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]

[quote name="sycks22" post=1234351]great looking magie doug[/quote]

i agree pete, wish i had the funds!! :(
Great card Doug!  Much better looking than the assigned grade. If I was more into "error" cards, I surely would have already made an offer.  GLWS
